name: bridge
description: Seller-executed cross-chain bridge via LI.FI. Buyer sends amount + 1% fee to executor. Supports all chains: ethereum, base, arbitrum, polygon, bsc.

amountHuman.description: Human-readable amount to bridge (e.g. '3' for $3 USDC). Buyer will be charged amount + 1% fee.

token.description: Source token symbol (e.g. USDC, WETH, USDT, DAI) or contract address.

toToken.description: Destination token symbol on target chain (optional). Defaults to same as token.

slippage.description: Slippage as decimal (0.005=0.5%) OR percent (0.5=0.5%). Default 0.5%.

dryRun.description: If true, only returns quote/txRequest without broadcasting.
